title: Hi .. i am joining pes this year (cse aiml at rr campus) .. it would be great if someones guides me on what are prerequisites i need to have. I want to talk to senior who has taken the course cse aiml about syllabus and all that .. please dm me

comments.body:
You really don't have to do anything. If you cannot enjoy your vacation for some reason then maybe learn some basic c/python/dsa

Here's the syllabus till the second year, cannot tell you what will be there in the third because even the college themselves don't know yet

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZQ8dkt5KfWoNX5_y9rWW0hE0s2pAnADE/view?usp=drivesdk
